forum.content: Is thereanyone who hasn't suffered for the secret love? We always think that love isvery heavy, heavy and could be the heaviest thing inthe world. But one day,when you look back, you suddenly realize thatit's always light, light. We allthought love was very deep, but infact it's very thin. The deepest and heaviest love must grow up withthe time.
forum.title: 珍惜那個人
